Flow.description: Captures input via screenflow for Work Orders using the 'Sourcing US - Lightning' record type. May be launched from the Account or Opportunity via the 'Sourcing' quick action button. Flow runs as system so that the field level security on 'Type of Request' field on the Work Order object may be edited in the Flow, while keeping the field read only outside of the Flow for all but admin users. Removed MLA functionality on 2024/10/05.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Region selection for the Work Order
dynamicChoiceSets.name: choiceset_req_Region

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Used as a set of picklist choices in a screen
dynamicChoiceSets.name: choiceset_UOMPicklistSet

formulas.description: Determines the Account record Id, based on the object type from which the flow was launched (retrieved via Apex action element)
formulas.name: fx_AccountIdCalculation

formulas.description:
Date value calculated based on criteria provided by the business. If the current weekday is a Saturday or Sunday, additional days will be added to the calculation. Additional holidays or weekend days will be included in the final calculation.
For WEEKDAY function, days translate to the following: Sunday = 1 Monday = 2 Tuesday = 3 Wednesday = 4 Thursday = 5 Friday = 6 Saturday = 7
formulas.name: fx_Date_InitialCompleteDate
formulas.expression: IF(WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 7, TODAY()+2, IF(WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 1, TODAY()+1, TODAY())) + IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Multi-Product Request 5+" &&({!var_ProdCat_Single}="Adhesives" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Labeling and Identification" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Strapping" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Tapes"), 5, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Multi-Product Request 5+", 10, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Replacement Item" &&({!var_ProdCat_Single}="Food Packaging" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Corrugated" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Pallets" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Tube/Core" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Chipboard" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Corner Board" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Molded Fiber"), 5, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Replacement Item", 2, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Cost Update" &&({!var_ProdCat_Single}="Food Packaging" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Retail Packaging - Display" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Retail Packaging - Folding Carton"), 5, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Cost Update", 2, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Custom Quote" &&({!var_ProdCat_Single}="Adhesives" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Labeling and Identification" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Strapping" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Tapes"), 3, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Custom Quote" &&({!var_ProdCat_Single}="Shrink Film" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Specialty Film" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Stretch Film"), 3, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="Custom Quote", 5, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="General Quote" &&({!var_ProdCat_Single}="Aerospace"|| {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Bags" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Mailers Non-corrugated" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Cushioning" || {!var_ProdCat_Single}="Temperature Controlled/Cold Chain Packaging"), 3, IF({!var_SegmentSelection}="Facility Solutions", 3, IF({!var_req_RequestType}="General Quote" &&{!var_ProdCat_Single}="Food Packaging", 5, 2))))))))))))

formulas.description: Calculates Target Complete Date with holidays, but does not include weekends
formulas.name: fx_Date_NoWeekendTargetCompleteDate

formulas.description: Calculates date to complete the WO request, including holidays and weekends
formulas.name: fx_Date_SetTargetCompleteDate

formulas.description: Based on multiple text inputs in the screen flow, this formula concatenates the text to store in the Int_l_Packaging_Dom_Cust_Details__c field on the Work Order record that will be created later in the flow. This was not changed from the former concatenation used in the Form Assembly form this flow replaces.
formulas.name: fx_Intl_IntlPackagingDomCustDetails
formulas.expression: IF( {!input_SPC_IntlSourcing} = TRUE, ( 'Who = ' & {!input_Intl_USCustWhoIsUSCust} & BR() & 'Annual sales and margin = ' & {!input_Intl_USCustSalesMargin} & BR() & 'Current credit and history = ' & {!input_Intl_USCustCreditLinePaymentHist} & BR() & 'Length of business history = ' & {!input_Intl_USCustCustomerYrs} & BR() & 'Currently under contract = ' & {!input_Intl_USCustUnderContract}), '')

formulas.description: Based on multiple text inputs in the screen flow, this formula concatenates the text to store in the Int_l_Packaging_Further_Details__c field on the Work Order record that will be created later in the flow. This was not changed from the former concatenation used in the Form Assembly form this flow replaces.
formulas.name: fx_Intl_IntlPackagingFurtherDetails
formulas.expression: IF( {!input_SPC_IntlSourcing} = TRUE, ( 'GM aware & supportive = ' & {!input_Intl_GMSupportive} & BR() & 'Where is business decision for Oppty = ' & {!input_Intl_BusinessDecision} & BR() & 'Nature of goods = ' & {!input_Intl_NatureOfGoods} & BR() & 'Type of turns = ' & {!input_Intl_TurnsExpected} & BR() & 'Price basis = ' & {!input_Intl_PricingBasis} & BR() & 'Any other value added services = ' & {!input_Intl_OtherValueAddSrvcs} & BR() & 'Manufacturers already determined = ' & {!input_Intl_CustHasMfrDetermined} & BR() & 'Veritiv able to source from preferred suppliers = ' & {!input_Intl_SourcePreferredSuppliers}), '')

formulas.description: Based on multiple text inputs in the screen flow, this formula concatenates the text to store in the Int_l_Packaging_Intl_Cust_Details__c field on the Work Order record that will be created later in the flow. This was not changed from the former concatenation used in the Form Assembly form this flow replaces.
formulas.name: fx_Intl_IntlPackagingIntlCustDetails
formulas.expression: IF( {!input_SPC_IntlSourcing} = TRUE, ( 'End user or contract manufacturer = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustEndUserOrContractMfr} & BR() & 'Potential for future Opptys = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustFutureOpptys} & BR() & 'Future Oppty details = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustExplain} & BR() & 'Payment terms = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustPaymentTerms} & BR() & 'Required intl warehouse = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustRequireWarehouseGoodsIntl} & BR() & 'What countries we sell = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustWhatContriesSellAndShip} & BR() & 'Veritiv Asia/EU inventory = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustVeritivAsiaEUOwnInventory} & BR() & 'Currencies for transactions = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustWhichCurrenciesTransact} & BR() & 'All direct business = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustAllDirectBusiness} & BR() & 'Sources of supply = ' & {!input_intl_IntlCustSourcesOfSupplyDeliveryPts}), '')

formulas.description: Based on multiple text inputs in the screen flow, this formula concatenates the text to store in the Int_l_Packaging_Key_Details__c field on the Work Order record that will be created later in the flow. This was not changed from the former concatenation used in the Form Assembly form this flow replaces.
formulas.name: fx_Intl_IntlPackagingKeyDetails
formulas.expression: IF( {!input_SPC_IntlSourcing} = TRUE, ( '>$1M = ' & {!input_Intl_OpptyOver1Mil} & BR() & 'NA>$3M = ' & {!input_Intl_OpptyNorthAmerOver3Mil} & BR() & 'Account good standing = ' & {!input_Intl_AcctGoodStanding} & BR() & 'FCLs = ' & {!input_Intl_MoveFCLs} & BR() & 'Multi-year = ' & {!input_Intl_MultiYearContract} & BR() & 'NA contract = ' & {!input_Intl_UnderContractNAmerica}), '')

formulas.description: Determines Opportunity Id when the object that launched the flow was from the Opportunity
formulas.name: fx_OpptyIdCalculation

formulas.description: Calculates the OwnerId to be assigned to the Work Order
formulas.name: fx_OwnerId
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!get_IntlSourcingQueueId.Id}), IF( ISBLANK({!get_QueueId_Corrugated.Id}), IF( ISBLANK({!get_QueueId_CorrugatedOther.Id}), IF( ISBLANK({!get_QueueId_FS.Id}), IF( ISBLANK({!get_QueueId_PKG.Id}), IF( ISBLANK({!get_QueueId_RetailPkg.Id}), "" , {!get_QueueId_RetailPkg.Id}) , {!get_QueueId_PKG.Id}) , {!get_QueueId_FS.Id}) , {!get_QueueId_CorrugatedOther.Id}) , IF( ISBLANK({!var_ServDiv_CorrSpecialistId}), {!get_QueueId_Corrugated.Id}, {!var_ServDiv_CorrSpecialistId})) , {!get_IntlSourcingQueueId.Id})

formulas.description: Calculates the value provided by the user stored in the referenced variables
formulas.name: fx_ProdCat

formulas.description: Updates value of field to FALSE if current value is NULL to avoid causing an error on record creation when the International Sourcing input picklist is hidden in the screen for those selections that don't require this input
formulas.name: fx_Req_IntlSourcingDataTypeConversion

formulas.description: Calculates the Servicing Division region based on the Servicing Division State
formulas.name: fx_ServDiv_Region

formulas.description: Calculates the Work Order record hyperlink to be used in the Text Template resource
formulas.name: fx_SingleWO_Hyperink

formulas.description: Calculates the Salesforce object name from which the Flow was launched. Used in the label on the 'Create Additional WO' screen to confirm if another request should be created.
formulas.name: fx_sObjectName

formulas.description: Calculates the current time minus 2 minutes to use in the get records element filter to find files that were added to the Account via the fileUpload element in the screen input
formulas.name: fx_Time_NowMinus2Mins

formulas.description: Calculates the length of the string created by the file upload component in a screen. This is used to determine if the user failed to upload files when required.
formulas.name: fx_UploadedFileLength

formulas.description: Increases the count of Work Orders by 1 to add to the variable for later use in the flow
formulas.name: fx_WO_Count

formulas.description: Determines the link text to take user to the new WO record
formulas.name: fx_WO_Link

formulas.description: Determines text to use in the email template, dependent on the object type that launched the flow
formulas.name: fx_WO_NotificationObjectData
formulas.expression: If({!var_ObjectName} = "Account", ( "Acct SysDivBillTo: "&{!get_obj_AccountRecord.Account_SysDivBillTo__c}&BR()& "Account Name: "&{!get_obj_AccountRecord.Name}&BR()& "Primary Sales Rep: "&{!get_obj_AccountRecord.Primary_Sales_Rep_Name__r.Name}), ( "Acct SysDivBillTo: "&{!get_obj_OpportunityRecord.Account.Account_SysDivBillTo__c}&BR()& "Account Name: "&{!get_obj_OpportunityRecord.Account.Name}&BR()& "Opportunity Name: "&{!get_obj_OpportunityRecord.Name}&BR()& "Primary Sales Rep: "&{!get_obj_OpportunityRecord.Account.Primary_Sales_Rep_Name__r.Name}))

formulas.description: Determines the subject text to be used in the email alert action
formulas.name: fx_WO_NotificationSubject

formulas.description: Calculates the label text used in the toggle on the WOLI add products screen
formulas.name: fx_WOLI_AddProducts_ToggleLabel
formulas.expression: IF({!var_SegmentSelection}='Packaging', 'Add another '&{!var_ProdCat_Single}&' item', 'Add another Facility Solutions item')

formulas.description: Determines if the value already exists in the the variable storing the list of Product Categories to prevent value duplication.
formulas.name: fx_WOLI_ProdCatDupeNull

formulas.description: Calculates the value provided by the user from the variables stored in either the input_woli_ProductCategoryFS or input_woli_ProductCategoryPkg
formulas.name: fx_WOLI_ProdCatLoop

Flow.interviewLabel: Work Order [SF] Sourcing Work Order Creation {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}

recordCreates.description: Creates a single Work Order Line Item record using the values previously collected in the Flow

screens.description: User input screen to collect International Sourcing details
screens.name: scn_Intl
screens.label: Intl Sourcing Details

fields.name: text_Intl_SegmentSelection
fields.fieldText:
Segment

{!var_SegmentSelection}

fields.name: sxn_Intl_IntlPkgDetails
fields.fieldText: International Packaging Details

fields.name: input_Intl_OpptyLoc
fields.fieldText: Where is the location of this Opportunity?

fields.name: input_Intl_OpptyOver1Mil
fields.fieldText: Is Opportunity > $1M?

fields.name: input_Intl_OpptyNorthAmerOver3Mil
fields.fieldText: Is the North American business > $3M?

fields.name: input_Intl_AcctGoodStanding
fields.fieldText: Is this Account in good standing?

fields.name: input_Intl_MoveFCLs
fields.fieldText: Able to move FCL's w/ their volume?

fields.name: input_Intl_MultiYearContract
fields.fieldText: Willing to enter a multi-year contract?

fields.name: input_Intl_UnderContractNAmerica
fields.fieldText: Are we under contract in North America?

fields.name: sxn_Intl_AddlQuestions
fields.fieldText: Additional Questions

fields.name: input_Intl_GMSupportive
fields.fieldText: Is your GM supportive of this international opportunity?

fields.name: input_Intl_BusinessDecision
fields.fieldText: Where is the business decision made for this Opportunity?

fields.name: input_Intl_NatureOfGoods
fields.fieldText: What is the nature of the goods to be sourced?

fields.name: input_Intl_TurnsExpected
fields.fieldText: What type of turns can be expected?

fields.name: input_Intl_PricingBasis
fields.fieldText: What is the pricing basis (margin, fee based, etc.)?

fields.name: input_Intl_OtherValueAddSrvcs
fields.fieldText: Any other value-added services?

fields.name: input_Intl_CustHasMfrDetermined
fields.fieldText: Does the customer have manufacturers already determined?

fields.name: input_Intl_SourcePreferredSuppliers
fields.fieldText: Does Veritiv have the option to source from preferred suppliers?

fields.name: sxn_Intl_USCustDetails
fields.fieldText: U.S. Customer Details

fields.name: input_Intl_USCustWhoIsUSCust
fields.fieldText: Who is the US based Customer?

fields.name: input_Intl_USCustSalesMargin
fields.fieldText: What are annual sales and margin?

fields.name: input_Intl_USCustCreditLinePaymentHist
fields.fieldText: What is the current credit line and payment history?

fields.name: input_Intl_USCustCustomerYrs
fields.fieldText: How long have we been doing business with them?

fields.name: input_Intl_USCustUnderContract
fields.fieldText: Are we currently under contract?

fields.name: sxn_intl_IntlCustDetails
fields.fieldText: International Customer Details

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustEndUserOrContractMfr
fields.fieldText: Is this the end user customer or a contract manufacturer?

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustFutureOpptys
fields.fieldText: Is there potential for future international opportunities?

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustExplain
fields.fieldText: If yes to above, please explain

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustPaymentTerms
fields.fieldText: What are the payment terms?

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustRequireWarehouseGoodsIntl
fields.fieldText: Will this require us to warehouse goods internationally?

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustWhatContriesSellAndShip
fields.fieldText: To which countries will we sell and ship?

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustVeritivAsiaEUOwnInventory
fields.fieldText: Will Veritiv Asia/EU need to own the inventory?

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustWhichCurrenciesTransact
fields.fieldText: Which currencies will we need to transact in?

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustAllDirectBusiness
fields.fieldText: Is this all direct business?

fields.name: input_intl_IntlCustSourcesOfSupplyDeliveryPts
fields.fieldText: Where are the sources of supply (what countries) and delivery points?

screens.description: Inputs for creation of the Work Order Record for Multi-Product request types

screens.label: Work Order Info

fields.name: text_MP_SegmentSelected
fields.fieldText:
Segment

{!var_SegmentSelection}

fields.name: text_MP_ProductSelected
fields.fieldText:
Sourcing Product Category

{!var_ProdCat_Single}

fields.name: text_MP_FormLink_MultiProd
fields.fieldText: Please upload the required Multi-Product Detail Request Form

fields.name: text_MP_FileUpload_Warning
fields.fieldText: Please upload the Request Form in order to submit this Work Request

screens.helpText: Use this screen to upload the required form containing each product you would like to include with this Work Order.

screens.description: Confirmation screen to let user know that a Work Order record has been created
screens.name: scn_NextAction_Finish
screens.label: Finish

fields.name: text_NextAction_Finish_SingleWO
fields.fieldText:
Sourcing Work Order #{!var_WONumber} has been created. You will receive an email for reference.


Click 'Finish' to complete your request.

screens.description: Confirmation screen to let user know that a Work Order record has been created
screens.name: scn_NextAction_New
screens.label: New

fields.name: text_NextAction_New
fields.fieldText:
Sourcing Work Order #{!var_WONumber} has been created. You will receive an email for reference.


Click 'Next' to create a new Sourcing request.

screens.description: User indicates if they would like to create a new Work Order, or complete the Flow.
screens.name: scn_NextAction_WO
screens.label: Next Action

fields.name: input_Next_Action_WO
fields.fieldText: Please choose one of the following:

screens.description: User input screen to collect general request type information
screens.name: scn_req_RequestType
screens.label: Request Type

fields.name: text_Req_AccountSysDivBillTo
fields.fieldText:
Account SysDivBillTo

{!var_AcctSysDivBillTo}

fields.name: text_Req_AccountName
fields.fieldText:
Account Name

{!var_AcctName}

fields.name: text_Req_PrimarySalesRep
fields.fieldText:
Primary Sales Rep

{!var_PrimarySalesRepName}

fields.name: text_Req_OpportunityName
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity

{!var_OpptyName}

fields.name: input_Req_RequestType
fields.fieldText: Request Type
fields.helpText:
General Quote - Standard or stock products for vendors but not established Veritiv products


Custom Quote - Products manufactured to customer specifications, custom print, or size


Cost Update - Cost and availability for existing Veritiv product


Replacement Item - Replacement product needed due to availability, material shortage, or extended lead time


Multi-Product Request 5+ - List of five or more products to quote, uploaded using an attachment

fields.name: input_Req_Region
fields.fieldText: Region

fields.name: input_Req_TSB
fields.fieldText: TSB Bid
fields.helpText: Indicates the Work Order is a tax supported business RFP/RFQ

fields.name: input_Req_ShipToZipCode
fields.fieldText: Ship-To Zip Code

validationRule.errorMessage: Value must be a number between 5 and 9 digits

screens.helpText:
This screen flow will allow you to create one or more Work Orders for the Sourcing team to process.


Request Types

  • General Quote - Standard or stock products for vendors but not established Veritiv products


  • Custom Quote - Products manufactured to customer specifications, custom print, or size


  • Cost Update - Cost and availability for existing Veritiv product


  • Replacement Item - Replacement product needed due to availability, material shortage, or extended lead time

﻿

  • Multi-Product Request 5+ - List of five or more products to quote, uploaded using an attachment

screens.description: Screen for Rigid AAC Requests (no Work Order created)
screens.name: scn_RigidAAC
screens.label: Rigid AAC

fields.name: text_RigidAAC_Header
fields.fieldText: Please contact All American Container directly for assistance quoting Rigid items:

fields.name: text_RigidAAC_WestContact
fields.fieldText:
West Contact

Brett Pierson

brett.pierson@veritivcorp.com

(510) 502-9191

fields.name: text_RigidAAC_EastContact
fields.fieldText:
East Contact

Guy Considine

gconsidine@americancontainers.com

(224) 206-6374

fields.name: sxn_RigidAAC_ProductLines
fields.fieldText: Product Lines

fields.name: text_RigidAAC_ProductLines
fields.fieldText:
Food and Beverage

Glass Jars, Plastic Jars, Bottles, Closures (CT, CRC, Dispensing Plastic), Metal Closures, Tubs (HDPE, Poly Pro, both in label and plain), Lids, Pails, Drums, Aluminum Cans


Wine and Spirits

Glass and Plastic Bottles, Closures, Capsules, Cork, Sleeves, Aluminum Cans


Personal Care / Cosmetic / Pet Care

Glass, PET, HDPE, PP, Jars, Packers, Closures, Sprayers, Pumps, Dispensing Closures, Bottles, Liners, Droppers


Household/Industrial Chemicals

Plastic Jugs (with and without handles), F-style, Tight Heads, Quart Bottles, Drums, Pails, Lids, Closures, Sprayers, Pumps, Paint Cans, Metal Pails


Nutraceutical/Pharma / Sports Nutrition

Plastic and Glass Packer Jars, Plastic Closures (CRC, CT, Droppers, Dispensing), Cotton, Desiccants, Wide Mouth Bottles (1, 2 and 2.5 Gallon PET and HDPE Bottles), Scoops

screens.helpText: Use this screen to create an entry for each product you would like to include with this Work Order.

textTemplates.description: Template used to send Email Alerts to the Corrugated Manager
textTemplates.name: tmp_EmailAlert_CorrMgr
textTemplates.text:
The following Sourcing Work Order has been assigned to the Corrugated Queue. Please open and assign to the appropriate Corrugated Specialist.

Also please check the Servicing Division {!get_ServDiv.Name}. Either the Corrugated Specialist has been deactivated or one has not been assigned to the record in Salesforce. Please assign an active Specialist to this Servicing Division.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Work Order Number: {!var_WONumber}

Servicing Division: {!get_ServDiv.Name}

Requestor: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}

Account: {!var_AcctName}

Opportunity: {!var_OpptyName}

_____________________________________________________________________________

To view this Work Order in Salesforce, click here: {!var_WONumber}

Thank you!

textTemplates.description: Template used to send Email Alerts to the Corrugated Specialist
textTemplates.name: tmp_EmailAlert_CorrSpecialist
textTemplates.text:
Sourcing Work Order #{!var_WONumber} has been assigned to {!get_User_SerDivCorrugatedSpecialist.Name}.


Account: {!var_AcctName}

Opportunity: {!var_OpptyName}

Segment: {!var_SegmentSelection}


To view this Work Order in Salesforce, click here: {!var_WONumber}

textTemplates.description: Template used to send Email Alerts to the Work Order Creator and PSR
textTemplates.name: tmp_EmailAlert_Creator_PSR
textTemplates.text:
The following Sourcing request has been created and is waiting for assignment in the {!var_WO_OwnerName} queue.


Account: {!get_obj_AccountRecord.Name}

Segment: {!var_SegmentSelection}

Sourcing Product Category: {!var_WOLI_WOProdCatList}


The Target Complete Date is on or before {!var_WO_Target_Complete_Date}.

Work Order Number: {!var_WONumber}

variables.description: Stores collection of Content Document Link vars for create record element later in the Flow
variables.name: coll_ContentDocumentLinkRecords

variables.description: Collection of Work Order Records to be created later in the flow
variables.name: coll_WO_RecordCollection

variables.description: Stores the ID of the record from which the process was launched
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Stores the Account Name of the Account record used in this flow
variables.name: var_AcctName

variables.description: Stores the Account SysDivBillTo of the Account record for later use in the flow
variables.name: var_AcctSysDivBillTo

variables.description: Stores Ids to be used later in the flow to relate each uploaded file [Content Document] to the new Work Order
variables.name: var_ContentDocumentId_RecordCollection

variables.description: Stores Ids to be used later in the flow to relate each uploaded file [Content Document] to the new Work Order
variables.name: var_ContentDocumentId_TextCollection

variables.description: Stores values for a single Content Document Link record
variables.name: var_ContentDocumentLink

variables.description: Stores the collection of email addresses to be used in the Email Alert
variables.name: var_EmailAlert_Collection

variables.description: If true, then no files were uploaded
variables.name: var_FileUpload_No

variables.description: Number of holidays between today and the original complete date. These will be added to the complete date to give extra days to deliver the final Work Order.
variables.name: var_HolidayCount

variables.description: Sets Intl Sourcing to FALSE
variables.name: var_IntlSourcing

variables.description: Stores the path from the Next Action Outcome decision element
variables.name: var_Next_Action_Outcome

variables.description: Object Name retrieved from the GetObjectName Apex action
variables.name: var_ObjectName

variables.description: Stores the Opportunity Name of the Opportunity record used in this flow
variables.name: var_OpptyName

variables.description: Stores the Owner Id that will be used to assign the owner to the current Work Order later in the flow
variables.name: var_OwnerId

variables.description: Stores the Primary Sales Rep name assigned to the Account to be used later in the flow
variables.name: var_PrimarySalesRep_Record

variables.description: Stores Product Category the user selected in a screen for use later in the flow
variables.name: var_prod_RequestDetails

variables.description: Stores a collection of Product Category values the user selected to be used to update the 'Prod Categories' field on the Work Order
variables.name: var_ProdCat_Collection

variables.description: Stores the Product Category selected for the input in the previous screen
variables.name: var_ProdCat_FS

variables.description: Holds values of all Product Categories including duplicates
variables.name: var_ProdCat_Merge

variables.description: Stores the Product Category selected for the input in the previous screen
variables.name: var_ProdCat_PKG

variables.description: Stores a single Product Category value the user selected to be used to update the 'Prod Categories' field on the Work Order
variables.name: var_ProdCat_Single

variables.description: Used as a reference to calculate the Work Order requested completion date
variables.name: var_ProdCatRef

variables.description: Stores MLA value the user selected in a prior screen to a variable
variables.name: var_req_MLA

variables.description: Stores Region the user selected in a prior screen to a variable
variables.name: var_req_Region

variables.description: Stores the Request Type the user selected in a previous screen
variables.name: var_req_RequestType

variables.description: Stores Ship To Zip Code the user selected in a prior screen to a variable
variables.name: var_req_ShipToZipCode

variables.description: Stores TSB Bid value the user selected in a prior screen to a variable
variables.name: var_req_TSBbid

variables.description: Stores the segment value the user selected in the input_seg_SegmentTypeSelection field on a previous screen
variables.name: var_SegmentSelection

variables.description: Stores the User Id of the Corrugated Specialist assigned to the Servicing Division
variables.name: var_ServDiv_CorrSpecialistId

variables.description: Stores the record Id of the Servicing Division
variables.name: var_ServDiv_RecordId

variables.description: Stores the Servicing Division region based on the State used the the formula
variables.name: var_ServDiv_Region

variables.description: Stores the record Id of the last Work Order created to be used later in the flow
variables.name: var_SingleWOrecordId

variables.description: Stores the Owner Name assigned to the Work Order Record
variables.name: var_WO_OwnerName

variables.description: Stores collection of Work Order record Ids
variables.name: var_WO_RecordIdCollection

variables.description: Stores the calculated 'Target Complete Date' from the Work Order record
variables.name: var_WO_Target_Complete_Date

variables.description: Stores the count of Work Orders created
variables.name: var_WOCount

variables.description: Stores a single Product Category value the user selected to be used to update the 'Prod Categories' field on the Work Order
variables.name: var_WOLI_AddProdCat

variables.description: Stores a value to determine if the user would like to add more Work Order Line Item products
variables.name: var_WOLI_AddProducts

variables.description: Stores the count of Work Order Line Items created
variables.name: var_WOLI_Count

variables.description: Stores the Order Frequency value to be used for the Work Order Line Item
variables.name: var_WOLI_OrderFreq

variables.description: Stores the Quantity value to be used for the Work Order Line Item
variables.name: var_WOLI_Quantity

variables.description: Collection of Work Order Line Item Records to be created later in the flow
variables.name: var_WOLI_RecordCollection

variables.description: Stores values for the Work Order Line Item to be created later in the flow
variables.name: var_WOLI_RecordValues

variables.description: Stores the record Id for the Work Order Line Item
variables.name: var_WOLI_SingleRecordId

variables.description: Stores the Submitter Line Comments value to be used for the Work Order Line Item
variables.name: var_WOLI_SubmitterLineComments

variables.description: Stores the UOM value to be used for the Work Order Line Item
variables.name: var_WOLI_UOM

variables.description: Stores a list of Product Category values the user selected to be used to update the 'Prod Categories' multi-select picklist field on the Work Order
variables.name: var_WOLI_WOProdCatList

variables.description: Stores the Work Order Number of the last Work Order created to be used as a reference in the email alert to requester
variables.name: var_WONumber

variables.description: Stores the value for the Status field on the Work Order to be used later in the Flow
variables.name: var_WOStatus
